'''Athel Wood Light Cargo Boxes''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Athel Wood Light Cargo Boxes is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after completing a {{Dendro}} [[Elemental Monument]] puzzle. This area of the map is unlocked during {{Quest|As the Khvarena's Light Shows}}.
